name: Revolution
content: I got a love that keeps on fighting
I got a heart that keeps on trying
我有一颗不断尝试的心
We got this planet it keeps evolving
我们拥有这颗不断进化的星球
Even when our hope is broken
There's so much for us to prove
我们有太多东西需要证明
There's so much for us to do
我们要做的事情太多了
因为我们可以发动革命
I say we'll start a revolution
我说我们要掀起一场革命
I got a love that keeps on fighting
I got a heart that keeps on trying
我有一颗不断尝试的心
There's so much for us to prove
我们有太多东西需要证明
There's so much for us to do
我们要做的事情太多了
Just we can start a revolution
我们可以发起一场革命
I say we start a revolution
我说我们开始一场革命
I say we start a revolution
我说我们开始一场革命
I say we start a revolution
我说我们开始一场革命
